name: Find Bird (match puzzle)
description:
Available on # WHERE IS THAT BIRD?

VS mode has been added! (¬‿¬)
- Compete with other players to see who's faster
- You can boast your skills with new stickers!!

Where have all the birds gone?
Find all the cute birds who have left the bustling farm again!
You need to find your bird quickly before the birds run away.


Sometimes a thief bird appears,
Thieves may have coins and tremendous treasures.
Focus on the thief bird! Do not miss it.

When searching for birds, try using three powerful power-ups.
Power-ups can be purchased in coins.

Find cute retro graphics and birds dancing at Find Bird.
- Find all the birds in the birds' book
- Bird levels up if you find many of the same kind
- Thief bird sometimes drop huge treasure chests!

Need Help? Have Questions?
We value your feedback! Please contact us at games@unit5soft.com

This game supports 'English', '한국어', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'Italian', 'Portuguese', 'Indonesian', 'Русский', 'Turkish', 'ไทย', 'Tiếng Việt'.
